original_text: For my loins are filled with a loathsome disease: and there is no soundness in my flesh.
korean_text: 내 허리에 열기가 가득하고 내 살에 성한 곳이 없나이다

sentences.original_text: For my loins are filled with a loathsome disease:
sentences.korean_translation: 내 허리는 역겨운 질병으로 가득 차 있고

sentences.original_text: and there is no soundness in my flesh.
